content.text:
Welcome! Pubs don't follow back everyone that follows them, they require that you use an invite code.

Here are some public pubs: https://github.com/ssbc/scuttlebot/wiki/Pub-Servers#public-pubs

To connect to [@diefreien.club](@Y2fxCQla30qvtLJufJ57Im0on1QO72H5KECXio5xQZs=.ed25519), for example, you'd need to:

- **Go to their site**: https://diefreien.club
- **Follow their instructions**: click "Click here to reveal invite code"
- **Copy their token**: something like `diefreien.club:8008:@Y2fxCQla30qvtLJufJ57Im0on1QO72H5KECXio5xQZs=.ed25519~WIKx3HX0Q/f5q/oYRsEGvk5+vV4GiIPP3aI3aVVz4X0=`
- Open Patchwork
- Click "Join Pub" at the top left
- Paste the token
- Click "Redeem invite"
